1.blurb: These untagged simulations are simulations that are meant to serve as examples for users looking for similar simulations to write their own. There are no rules or criteria for these simulations and any simultation that are different from what exists already will qualify.

5.blurb: Itto doing Itto things (maintained by Tris)

6.blurb: Collection of simulationsi that utilize random delays in their rotation

7.blurb: Arfoire's collection of simulations targetted towards new players

8.blurb: Collection of simulations with rotation written as a priority list (also frequently know as action priority list, or APL)

9.blurb: Collection of simulations used by various guide writers for KQM, etc...
